Text.val: 15.04.2009 MKO SCR14463 From Getparam remove B_CANCEL,B_SELECT,B_LOCATE,B_RANGE
24.10.2005 MW SCR#9331 --> New param needed fot the HYDT Selection
10-09-2002 JP SCR#2122 change range for language to USER_LANGUAGE
10.07.2002 SH Made screen a little bit bigger, to show the hole description
call Task1 or Task2 according to input parameters(alpa or numeric)

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT CODE_NUMBERN FROM :1/CODE WHERE (CODE_LANGUAGE=':2') AND (CODE_TYPE=:3) AND (not exists (SELECT * FROM :1/HYDT WHERE (CODE.CODE_NUMBERN=HYDT_DOCTYPE)) OR exists (SELECT * FROM :1/HYDT WHERE (CODE.CODE_NUMBERN=HYDT_DOCTYPE) AND (HYDT_DISPLAYINZOOMLIST='Y')))
